snippet: The wreckage of a demonstration airplane for a Russian-made jet that vanished on Wednesday over Indonesia was found Thursday, and there were no signs of survivors among 50 people aboard the plane.
abstract: Wreckage of the Sukhoi Superjet 100, a demonstration airplane for a Russian-made passenger jet that vanished during a 50-minute flight over Indonesia, is found there on the side of a mountain volcano; there are no signs of survivors among 50 people aboard the plane; Superjet is first new model to be produced in Russia since the end of the Soviet Union.

byline.original: By ANDREW E. KRAMER and NICOLA CLARK
byline.contributor: Andrew E. Kramer reported from Moscow, and Nicola Clark from Paris. Ellen Barry contributed reporting from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: The wreckage of a demonstration airplane for a Russian-made jet that vanished on Wednesday over Indonesia was found Thursday, and there were no signs of survivors among 50 people aboard the plane.

headline.seo: New Russian Plane Crashes Over Indonesia
headline.main: New Russian Aircraft Crashes During a Promotional Flight in Indonesia
headline.print_headline: New Russian Aircraft Crashes During a Promotional Flight in Indonesia
